name: Homesick+
description:
After the fiasco of ghosts and ghouls in Mark's house, he decided it was time for fresh air and called up his friends Bob and Wade for a nice relaxing camping trip.

Though what seems like a normal camping trip, something spoopy lurks within the woods. What will Mark and the gang find? Will Wade be awesome? Will demons stalk Mark forever? Or will we get some explination for all these shannagins?

Probably not the last question...

UPDATE: MacOS Version Now avalible!!
